00025   dkrl() { }

00027   dkrl(disk* i,rline* j, bool lexiswap) : inter2d(), i_(i), j_(j) 
00028     { 
00029     facn0_ = facn1_ = facn2_ = facn4_ = 0.0;
00030     fact0_ = fact1_ = fact2_ = fact4_ = 0.0;
00031     facs0_ = facs1_ = facs2_ = 0.0;
00032     
00033     // voir dkdkP...
00034     if (lexiswap) { lexi0_ = j; lexi1_ = i; }
00035     else          { lexi0_ = i; lexi1_ = j; }
00036     }

00041         
00042   ~dkrl() {}

00044   disk*  first()  { return i_; }
00045   rline* second() { return j_; }
00046   
00047   void plug(body2d* b1, body2d* b2) 
00048     {
00049     i_ = dynamic_cast<disk*>(b1);
00050     j_ = dynamic_cast<rline*>(b2);
00051 
00052     if(i_->id() < j_->id())
00053       {
00054       lexi0_ = b1;
00055       lexi1_ = b2;
00056       }
00057     else
00058       {
00059       lexi0_ = b2;
00060       lexi1_ = b1;
00061       }
00062     }
00063 
00064   body2d* lexifirst()  { return lexi0_; }
00065   body2d* lexisecond() { return lexi1_; }
